node.title: Automating Software Installation in Windows Using Chocolatey
node.excerpt: Installing required softwares in fresh installed windows is time consuming work. Chocolatey will install all your software in a single command. You just need to find the package name from Chocolatey and execute the command. That's it. Chocolatey will take care of remaining.

node.title: Debug device specific issues on your website - Remote debugging
node.excerpt: Fixing device specific issues using chrome device tooler, chrome remote debugging and online real device testing tool
